("SAH") BULLETIN TYPE:  Halt BULLETIN DATE:  April 4, 2014 TSX Venture Tier 2 Company, 23058=TSX Venture Exchange has accepted for filing documentation with respect to the first tranche of a Non-Brokered Private Placement announced January 23, 2014:, 3405=Pursuant to a resolution passed by the Directors on January 8, 2014, the Company has changed its name as follows.  There is no consolidation of capital., 114314=Hampton Securities Limited, BT Global Growth Inc. and RangerCap Inc. ont reçu collectivement une commission de 216 600 $, un remboursement des dépenses légales et de travail encourus d'environ 40 000 $, 381 200 bons de courtier non-transférables au prix d'exercice de 0,50 $ par action pendant 18 mois suivant la clôture du placement privé et 500 000 bons de courtier de performance au prix d'exercice de 0,50 $ par action jusqu'au 31 mars 2016, sur une base post-consolidation., 66224=These warrants were issued pursuant to a private placement of 8,185,165 shares with 8,185,165 share purchase warrants attached, which was accepted for filing by the Exchange effective October 23, 2013., 97932=Hampton Securities Limited, BT Global Growth Inc. and RangerCap Inc. collectively received a commission of $216,600, reimbursement of legal fees and work fees of approximately $40,000, 381,200 non-transferable broker warrants at an exercise price of $0.50 per share for 18 months following the closing date of the Private Placement and 500,000 broker performance warrants at an exercise price of $0.50 until March 31, 2016, on a post-consolidation basis., 71635=QUATTRO EXPLORATION & PRODUCTION LTD. ("QXP") BULLETIN TYPE:  Private Placement-Non-Brokered, Convertible Debenture/s BULLETIN DATE:  April 4, 2014 TSX Venture Tier 2 Company, 13123=TSX Venture Exchange has accepted for filing a subscription agreement dated November 13, 2013, as amended (the "Agreement") between Blue River Resources Ltd. (the "Company") and Global Resources Investment Trust plc ("GRIT"), an investment trust registered in England and Wales and listed on the London Stock Exchange's main market.  Under the Agreement the Company acquired 359,515 ordinary shares (the "GRIT Shares") in the capital of GRIT at a deemed price of £1.00 per GRIT Share in exchange for 10,000,000 common shares in the capital of the Company at a price of CDN$0.067 per common share., 61369=The above is in compliance with Trading Rule C.2.18 – Expiry Date: Trading in the warrants shall be for cash for the three trading days preceding the expiry date and also on expiry date. On the expiry date, trading shall cease at 12 o'clock noon E.T. and no transactions shall take place thereafter except with permission of the Exchange., 111573=Suite au bulletin de la Bourse de croissance TSX daté du 3 décembre 2013, la négociation des titres de l'émetteur résultant sera reprise à l'ouverture des marchés le lundi 7 avril 2014., 16403=CHLORMET TECHNOLOGIES INC. (« FRA ») TYPE DE BULLETIN: Placement privé sans l'entremise d'un courtier DATE DU BULLETIN : Le 4 avril 2014 Société du groupe 2 de TSX Croissance, 111929=Bourse de croissance TSX a accepté le dépôt de la documentation en vertu d'un placement privé par l'entremise d'un courtier, tel qu'annoncé 2 décembre 2013. Ce placement privé fut complété dans ThermoCeramix les 24 décembre 2013 et 13 février 2014. Les titres de ThermoCeramix émis en vertu de ce placement privé furent convertis en titres de l'émetteur résultant lors de la clôture de l'opération admissible, comme suit:, 125797=TSX Venture Exchange has accepted for filing documentation with respect to a Non-Brokered Private Placement announced April 22, 2013:, 7922=BARKER MINERALS LTD. ("BML") BULLETIN TYPE:  Private Placement-Non-Brokered BULLETIN DATE:  April 4, 2014 TSX Venture Tier 2 Company, 21297=DISCOVERY-CORP ENTERPRISES INC. (« FRA ») TYPE DE BULLETIN : Convention d'achat de propriété, d'actif ou d'actions DATE DU BULLETIN : Le 4 avril 2014 Société du groupe 2 de TSX Croissance, 95087=For further information, please refer to the Company's Filing Statement dated March 26, 2014, available on SEDAR., 21573=TSX Venture Exchange has accepted for filing a subscription agreement dated November 13, 2013, as amended January 31, 2014 (the "Agreement") between Discovery-Corp Enterprises Inc. (the "Company") and Global Resources Investment Trust plc ("GRIT"), an investment trust registered in England and Wales and listed on the London Stock Exchange's main market.  Under the Agreement the Company will acquire 280,449 ordinary shares (the "GRIT Shares") in the capital of GRIT at a deemed price of £1.00 per GRIT Share in exchange for 3,000,000 common shares in the capital of the Company at a price of CDN$0.17 per common share., 43846=The Company has confirmed the closing of the above-mentioned Private Placement by way of a news release dated March 3, 2014., 22804=EQUITORIAL EXPLORATION CORP. ("EXX") BULLETIN TYPE:  Private Placement-Non-Brokered BULLETIN DATE:  April 4, 2014 TSX Venture Tier 2 Company, 77341=TSX Venture Exchange has accepted for filing documentation with respect to a Non-Brokered Private Placement announced March 13, 2014:, 66787=NORTHERN GOLD MINING INC. ("NGM") BULLETIN TYPE:  Private Placement- Non-Brokered BULLETIN DATE:  April 4, 2014 TSX Venture Tier 2 Company, 16035=For further information please read the Company's news releases dated November 14, 2013, January 23, 2014 and March 7, 2014 which are available on SEDAR under the Company's profile., 131229=The shares of the Company were listed on TSX Venture Exchange on May 4, 2012.  The Company, which is classified as a Capital Pool Company ('CPC'), is required to complete a Qualifying Transaction ('QT') within 24 months of its date of listing, in accordance with Exchange Policy 2.4., 92994=TSX Venture Exchange has accepted for filing the Company's Qualifying Transaction ("QT") described in its Filing Statement dated March 26, 2014.  As a result, at the opening on Monday, April 7, 2014, the Company will no longer be considered as a Capital Pool Company., 65698=October 18, 2016, 25182=FREYJA RESOURCES INC. ("FRA") BULLETIN TYPE: Shares for Bonuses BULLETIN DATE: April 4, 2014 TSX Venture Tier 2 Company, 58183=Pour de plus amples renseignements, veuillez-vous référer aux communiqués de presse émis par la société les 5 février et 3 mars 2014., 67070=TSX Venture Exchange has accepted for filing documentation with respect to a Non-Brokered Private Placement announced November 18, 2013:, 109278=L'opération admissible consiste en l'acquisition auprès de personnes sans lien de dépendance, via une fusion, de la totalité des titres émis et en circulation de ThermoCeramix, Inc. (« ThermoCeramix ») par l'émission de : (a) 26 274 409 actions ordinaires au prix réputé de 0,50 $ par action, (b) 2 637 945 options d'achat d'actions incitatives ayant des prix d'exercices variant entre 0,16 $ et 0,60 $ par action et des dates d'expiration ne dépassant pas le 14 novembre 2023, (c) 53 100 bons de souscription  au prix d'exercice de 0,50 $ par action jusqu'au 17 décembre 2015, (d) 381 200 bons de courtier ayant un prix d'exercice de 0,50 $ pendant 18 mois suivant la clôture du placement privé décrit ci-dessous et (e) 500 000 bons de courtier de performance ayant un prix d'exercice de 0,50 $ jusqu'au 31 mars 2016. Les titres décrits ci-dessus ont été émis sur une base post-consolidation. La transaction décrite ci-dessus inclut les titres émis en vertu du placement privé de ThermoCeramix décrit à la section « Placement privé par l'entremise d'un courtier » de ce bulletin., 92526=THERMOCERAMIX CORPORATION ("TCX") [formerly Springrock Capital Inc. ("SGK.P")] BULLETIN TYPE: Qualifying Transaction-Completed/New Symbol, Resume Trading, Private Placement-Brokered, Name Change and Consolidation BULLETIN DATE: April 4, 2014 TSX Venture Tier 2 Company, 93371=The QT consists of the arm's length acquisition, by way of merger, of all the issued and outstanding securities of ThermoCeramix, Inc. ("ThermoCeramix") through the issuance of: (a) 26,274,409 common shares  at a deemed price of $0.50 per share, (b) 2,637,945 incentive stock options at exercise prices varying between $0.16 and $0.60 per share with expiry dates up to November 14, 2023, (c) 53,100 warrants having an exercise price of $0.50 per share until December 17, 2015, (d) 381,200 broker warrants having an exercise price of $0.50 for 18 months following the closing date of the private placement described below, and (e) 500,000 broker performance warrants having an exercise price of $0.50 until March 31, 2016. The securities described above were issued on a post-consolidation basis. The above-described transaction includes the securities issued pursuant to a private placement of ThermoCeramix described at the section "Private Placement-Brokered" of this bulletin., 2511=282541 20 0, 125480=UNISERVE COMMUNICATIONS CORPORATION ("USS") BULLETIN TYPE:  Private Placement-Non-Brokered, Convertible Debenture/s BULLETIN DATE:  April 4, 2014 TSX Venture Tier 1 Company, 17421=TSX Venture Exchange has accepted for filing documentation with respect to a Non-Brokered Private Placement announced March 14, 2014:, 290913=Terms of Use & Our Privacy Statement - About Newsfeeds / Videofeeds. textAfterTable: (Pierre Caland) Pursuant to Corporate Finance Policy 4.1, Section 1.11(d), the Company has issued a news release announcing the closing of the private placement and setting out the expiry dates of the hold period(s).
